concordance
Class IndexItem

java.lang.Object
  concordance.IndexItem

public class IndexItem
extends java.lang.Object

Holds concordance data for a particular index word or phrase. The IndexItem stores a Vector of each occurrence of the index word or phrase in the source text file, along with a reference to the element in the Concordance's contexts Vector for the first sentence it appears in.

Author:
Sam Nicholls (msn)

Field Detail

lineNumbers

private java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> lineNumbers

contextRef

private int contextRef
Constructor Detail

IndexItem

public IndexItem()
Default IndexItem Constructor. Initialises lineNumbers vector and sets contextRef to -1.

Method Detail

setContextRef

public void setContextRef(int ref)
Set the sentence context reference for this IndexItem. The context for a index word or phrase is the first sentence in which it appears in the source text file. This field references an element in the contexts Vector of the Concordance in which the sentence has been placed.

Parameters:
ref - The element of the Concordance's contexts Vector that contains the context for this index word or phrase.

getContextRef

public int getContextRef()
Get the context reference for this IndexItem. The context for a index word or phrase is the first sentence in which it appears in the source text file. This field references an element in the contexts Vector of the Concordance in which the sentence has been placed.

Returns:
The element of the Concordance's contexts Vector that contains the context for this index word or phrase.

addLineNumber

public void addLineNumber(int lineCount)
Add a line number occurrence to this IndexItem. An element in this IndexItem's lineNumber Vector is created each time the word is found in the source text file, containing the line number the index word or phrase was detected on.

Parameters:
lineCount - The line number of the source text file an occurrence has been found in.

getLineNumbers

public java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> getLineNumbers()
Return the Vector of line number occurrences for this IndexItem.

Returns:
Vector - The Vector that stores all the line number occurrences for this IndexItem.
